title: Hey riot devs
body: Do you guys plan to come to the Brisbane Opl if anyone is coming at all

replies.body: Hey Darude,  I'm hoping I can make the trip up to Brisbane for the finals.  I'm an engineer that's works on the web side of things - so not directly on the game itself.  Are you making the trip?

Hey koyotee 
Glad to know not only players but devs are coming 
I live in Brisbane so it's really only a train ride for me
Hope to see you there friend! I may not be a dev myself, but as a commentator I'll be making every effort to show up :P
Sweet glad to know that everyone is excited to come
